name: Climax Trading
description: Manufacturer and Supplier of Aluminium f
overview:
Incorporated in the year 1970 at Mohan Nagar, (Ghaziabad, India) “Climax Trading Company” are a renowned manufacturer and supplier of an extensive range of the finest quality Aluminium Foils Rolls and Heat Sealable Foil Lids etc. We are an ISO 9001-2008 Certified Company, are proud to offer the topmost quality of premium Aluminium foil products, with years of commitment and sincere hard work we are turned to a reputed Aluminium foil converting company and gradually emerging as one of the top most leaders in its range of products.

Our Team: A team of well-versed and dedicated professionals are always available at our place to support us in all situations. People working with us have deep industry experience and are capable of manufacturing products of the highest standards and as per specifications of clients.

Quality: We are one of the most appreciated manufacturers and supplier of a wide range of high quality Aluminium Foils Rolls and Heat Sealable Foil Lids. Our concerns for the quality of our products have helped us in designing a quality controlled framework in our manufacturing unit. Every product manufactured by us is stringently quality tested at each stage of development by experienced quality analysts working with us.

Infrastructure: With the years of experience in domestic and international market and in-depth knowledge of products, our team of professional provides our customers the best possible solutions in order to meet their critical packaging needs. Our products have found various applications in diverse industries, such as pharmaceuticals, food & beverages, cosmetics and more.

Our Products: Aluminium Foils Aluminum Pharma Foils Aluminium Blister Foils
